title: MySQLLTRIM()Function

metadata.description: Learn about MySQLLTRIM()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Example
Remove leading spaces from a string:
SELECT LTRIM("     SQL Tutorial") AS LeftTrimmedString;

Definition and Usage
The LTRIM() function removes leading spaces from a string.
Syntax
LTRIM(
string
)
Parameter Values
Parameter
Description
string
Required. The string to remove leading spaces from
Technical Details
Works in:
From MySQL 4.0

★
+1

content_sections.title: Example
content_sections.code: SELECT LTRIM("     SQL Tutorial") AS LeftTrimmedString;

summary: This tutorial covers MySQLLTRIM()Function concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use MySQLLTRIM()Function effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of MySQLLTRIM()Function and how to apply it in your projects.
